member.name: M:AutoMapper.Attributes.Extensions.MapTypes(System.Reflection.Assembly,AutoMapper.IMapperConfigurationExpression)
member.summary: Maps all types with the MapsTo/MapsFrom attributes to the type specified in MapTo/MapFrom.
member.param: The assembly to search for types.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Attributes.Mapptribute
member.summary: The base class for attributes that map objects to other objects using AutoMapper.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Attributes.Mapptribute.ReverseMap
member.summary: If true, mapping will be configured in reverse as well.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the target class maps from the specified type. The attributed class is the target, the type specified is the source.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromAttribute.SourceType
member.summary: The type that the target class will be mapped to.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromAttribute.#ctor(System.Type)
member.param: The type that the target class maps to.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromPropertyAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the target property maps from a property from the specified type.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromPropertyAttribute.SourceType
member.summary: The type whose property the target property will be mapped from.

member.name: P:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromPropertyAttribute.PropertyName
member.summary: The name of the property to map from.

member.name: M:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsFromPropertyAttribute.#ctor(System.Type,System.String)
member.param: The type whose property the target property will be mapped from.
The name of the property to map from. Supports dot notation.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsPropertyAttribute
member.summary: Base class for mapping properties to other properties.

member.name: T:AutoMapper.Attributes.MapsToAttribute
